Company: Regional Home Care, Inc., d/b/a North Atlantic Medical Services
Regional Home Care, Inc. dba North Atlantic Medical Services
Description: Regional Home Care agreed to pay a total of $852,378 to federal and state authorities in settlement of allegations it billed Midicaid and Medicare for unlicenced services in the treatment of respiratory ailments. State award was noted as $230,000. The settlement was also announced by the Justice Department; see the Violation Tracker entry at https://violationtracker.goodjobsfirst.org/violation-tracker/-regional-home-care-inc-dba-north-atlanti
